attributes.action: Bring down the voting age to sixteen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By the time a teenager in this day and age turns sixteen, he/she is able to marry, have children, and even work full time. if this is the case then i see no reason why they can't vote for who runs their country.
People complain that "the younger generation" doesn't care. give them a chance like this and maybe they will.
